sourcesContent:
Voila la surprise du chef
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-clients', templateUrl: './clients.component.html', styleUrls: ['./clients.component.scss'] }) export class ClientsComponent { show= false; toggle= this.show = !this.show; montreToi(ici: HTMLElement){ ici.style.backgroundColor = "red" ici.style.color= "salmon" } }
